posts.author: DungeonMasterDave
posts.content:
In our last session, we encountered a Tarrasque and tried to use running to gain an advantage, but it didn't work out as planned.

Looking at page 127 of the Player's Handbook, it states that running functions based on your proficiency bonus and ability modifiers.

In the new 2024 rules update, they changed how running works. Now it's more streamlined but I'm not sure if it's better overall.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about running. Based on my experience, it works differently.
